core:executeScriptAction.core:comment: We set this explicitly to stop the ProcessDeviceEvents process responding to printer events. It is set automatically when printing starts, but the printer driver may have cleared it on raising the printer error event.

We set this explicitly to stop the ProcessDeviceEvents process responding to printer events. It is also set automatically when printing starts but the printer driver may have cleared it on raising the printer error event.

core:action.core:comment: Test if Retry Allowed - default true

core:promptState.core:name: Printing State
core:promptState.core:comment: Print receipt. Prompt timeout is set greater than the default print timeout of 15 seconds.
